statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, position, height FROM player_profiles WHERE height > 180;
SELECT name FROM player_profiles WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT id, name, previous_teams FROM player_profiles WHERE previous_teams IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, position FROM player_profiles WHERE height > 180 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name, height FROM player_profiles WHERE position = 'Forward' ORDER BY height ASC
SELECT * FROM player_profiles ORDER BY position, name
SELECT name, height, previous_teams FROM player_profiles WHERE height < 190 AND position = 'Defender'
SELECT id, name, position, previous_teams FROM player_profiles WHERE name LIKE '%son%'
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT name, position FROM player_profiles ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, city FROM team_details WHERE city='New York';
SELECT name, position, height FROM player_profiles WHERE position='Forward' ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT id, name, previous_teams FROM player_profiles WHERE previous_teams IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, position, height FROM player_profiles WHERE height > 180 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, city FROM team_details WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY coach_name;
SELECT id, name, position, previous_teams FROM player_profiles WHERE position = 'Forward' ORDER BY name, id DESC;
SELECT id, name, position FROM player_profiles WHERE height BETWEEN 170 AND 190 ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT id, team_name, coach_name, city FROM player_profiles JOIN team_details ON player_profiles.id = team_details.team_id WHERE player_profiles.position = 'Guard' ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, position, height FROM player_profiles WHERE position = 'Forward';

SELECT player_name, team_name FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_team_mapping ON player_profiles.player_id = player_team_mapping.player_id INNER JOIN team_profiles ON player_team_mapping.team_id = team_profiles.team_id;

SELECT player_name, team_name FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN player_team_mapping ON player_profiles.player_id = player_team_mapping.player_id INNER JOIN team_profiles ON player_team_mapping.team_id = team_profiles.team_id WHERE team_location = 'New York';
SELECT player_name, position, height FROM player_profiles WHERE height > 180 ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, position, height, previous_teams FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE position = 'Forward' AND height > 180;

SELECT player_name, team_name, start_date, end_date FROM player_profiles pp JOIN player_team_mapping ptm ON pp.player_id = ptm.player_id JOIN team_profiles tp ON ptm.team_id = tp.team_id WHERE team_name = 'Barcelona';

SELECT player_name, team_name, team_location FROM player_profiles pp JOIN player_team_mapping ptm ON pp.player_id = ptm.player_id JOIN team_profiles tp ON ptm.team_id = tp.team_id WHERE established_year > 2000;

SELECT player_name, team_name, start_date, end_date FROM player_profiles pp JOIN player_team_mapping ptm ON pp.player_id = ptm.player_id JOIN team_profiles tp ON ptm.team_id = tp.team_id WHERE team_location = 'Madrid' AND position = 'Midfielder';
SELECT * FROM Players;
SELECT name, position FROM Players WHERE height > 180;
SELECT team_name, city, country FROM Teams WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists FROM PlayerStats ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT player_id, team_id, start_date, end_date FROM Contracts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, position, height FROM Players;
SELECT team_name, city, country FROM Teams WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT player_id, games_played, goals_scored, assists FROM PlayerStats ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT contract_id, player_id, team_id, start_date, end_date FROM Contracts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, name, position, previous_teams FROM Players WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT * FROM PlayerProfiles;
SELECT name, position FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT team_name, city FROM TeamProfiles ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT match_id, team_id, opponent_team_id FROM MatchHistory WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, matches_played, goals_scored FROM PlayerStats ORDER BY goals_scored DESC, matches_played ASC;
SELECT id, name, position FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT team_name, city FROM TeamProfiles WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT match_id, team_id, opponent_team_id FROM MatchHistory ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, matches_played, goals_scored, assists FROM PlayerStats WHERE goals_scored > 10 ORDER BY matches_played DESC;
SELECT team_id, matches_won, matches_lost, goals_for, goals_against FROM TeamStats WHERE matches_won > matches_lost ORDER BY goals_for DESC;
